intro: Discover a Spirit Key to get access to special perks and be among the first to try the Talisman wallet extension
altDownload: Click here if download failed to start after 10 seconds.
willTakeFewMins: The transfer will take a few minutes to sync so please avoid sending again.

whatIsInfo.title: What is a Spirit Key?
whatIsInfo.description: A Spirit Key is a a special RMRK NFT of which there are only 3333. Holders will be able to access special perks including:
list: The opportunity to participate in the Alpha release of our wallet extension
Permissioned channels in our Discord for Spirit Clan members
Early access to new features in the Talisman web app

howToGetInfo.title: Where can I get one?
howToGetInfo.description: Keys have been seen in various locations, but never for very long. The best places to currently find them are:
list: Keeping an eye out for giveaways on <1>Twitter</1>
By arranging to review, publish or produce media about Talisman

poem: Talisman Seeker, it's your spirit that's key.
At the end of your seeking, you'll finally be free.
A key to the new world is a difficult thing.
You should ask yourself honestly, "what on earth should I bring?"
Give a moment of thought as to whether it can be brought.
All I can guarantee, is that nothing is for naught.
spiritClan.title: Discover a Spirit Key to join the Spirit Clan.
info: A Spirit Key is a NFT which allows you to join the Spirit Clan.
Spirit Clan members can access a permissioned Discord channel where they'll have the opportunity to help shape Talisman.
Spirit Clan members will receive early access to new products, events, NFT drops and more.
spiritClan.noKeyPlaceholder: You don't have a key yet. Get one on Singular.
